Replying to @MaOberlehner 2021-03-05 17:02
@MaOberlehner @smashingmag @cloudinary I like using the @cloudinary fetch API with a URL to both ingest the original, and serve the optimised result on Cloudinary. If you do that with a @Netlify redirect, the user doesn't have an extra DNS lookup and caching happens. A short video on that: https://t.co/KekJuOg6zK
